Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It provides more straightforward feedback and suggestions, provided that it knows your criteria, whereas my teachers are much more vague.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I think I like getting the feedback from a person more because they are the ones marking my work in the end, and AI is not without its faults. Teachers generally pick up more on recurring issues.
